channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Removal of deprecated DISCO & WSDL aspx pages from SharePoint Online】从SharePoint在线删除不推荐的迪斯科和WSDL ASPX页面
item.description: 【We are removing DSICO and WSDL pages from the SharePoint Online by mid September 2025.】我们将于2025年9月中旬从SharePoint在线删除DSICO和WSDL页面。

item.title: 【Python in Visual Studio Code – April 2025 Release】Visual Studio代码中的Python - 2025年4月发布
item.description: 【The April 2025 release of the Python and Jupyter extensions for Visual Studio Code is now available. This update introduces enhancements to the Copilot experience in Notebooks, improved support for editable installs, faster and more reliable diagnostics, and the addition of custom Node.js arguments with Pylance, and more!】2025年4月的Python和Jupyter Extensions发布了Visual Studio代码的扩展。此更新介绍了笔记本中的Copilot体验的增强功能，改进了对可编辑的安装的支持，更快，更可靠的诊断，以及添加具有Pylance的自定义Node.js参数，等等！

item.title: 【Build AI agents with Python in #AgentsHack】在#AgentShack中使用Python构建AI代理
item.description: 【Microsoft is holding an AI Agents Hackathon, and we want to see what you can build with Python! We'll have 20+ live streams showing you how to build AI agents with Python using popular agent frameworks and Microsoft technologies. Then, you can submit your project for a chance to win prizes, including a Best in Python prize!】微软正在举办AI代理黑客马拉松，我们想看看您可以使用Python构建什么！我们将拥有20多个直播流，向您展示如何使用流行的代理框架和Microsoft Technologies使用Python构建AI代理。然后，您可以提交项目以获取奖品的机会，包括最好的Python奖！

item.title: 【Boards Integration with GitHub Enterprise Cloud and Data Residency (Public Preview)】董事会与GitHub Enterprise Cloud和Data Residency集成（公共预览）
item.description: 【Back in January, we launched a private preview of our Boards integration with GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency. If you’re unfamiliar with GitHub’s data residency option and what it means for your organization, you can learn more in the original announcement. Since the private preview launch, we’ve gathered valuable feedback from early adopters, and […]】早在一月份，我们与GitHub Enterprise Cloud一起启动了董事会的私人预览，并启动了数据驻留。如果您不熟悉GitHub的数据居留权选项以及对组织的意义，则可以在原始公告中了解更多信息。自私人预览发布以来，我们收集了早期采用者的宝贵反馈，[…]

item.title: 【Semantic Kernel Agents are now Generally Available】语义内核代理现在通常可用
item.description: 【The time is finally here, Semantic Kernel’s Agent framework is now Generally Available! Available today as part of Semantic Kernel 1.45 (.NET) and 1.27 (Python), the Semantic Kernel Agent framework makes it easier for agents to coordinate and dramatically reduces the code developers need to write to build amazing AI applications. What does Generally Available […]】时间终于在这里，语义内核的代理框架现在通常可用！今天作为语义内核1.45（.net）和1.27（Python）的一部分可用，语义内核代理框架使代理更容易协调和大幅度减少代码开发人员所需写入的代码以构建惊人的AI应用程序。通常可用的是什么[…]

item.title: 【Build a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server in C#】在C＃中构建模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器
item.description: 【Learn how to build a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server using the C# SDK to enable seamless communication between AI models and applications.】了解如何使用C＃SDK构建模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器，以启用AI模型和应用程序之间的无缝通信。

item.title: 【Pure Virtual C++ 2025 Talks Announced】宣布的纯虚拟C ++ 2025演讲
item.description: 【Pure Virtual C++ is our free, one-day, virtual conference for the whole C++ community. This year, it is running on the 30th April. We’re pleased to announce four of our five live sessions for the day: Welcome to v1.0 of the meta::[[verse]]! with Inbal Levi Proxy: Next Generation Polymorphism with Mingxin Wang Making unfamiliar C++ […]】纯虚拟C ++是我们为整个C ++社区提供的免费，为期一天的虚拟会议。今年，它在4月30日运行。我们很高兴宣布当天的五个现场会议中的四次：欢迎来到元v1.0 :: [[verse]]！与Inbal Levi代理：Mingxin Wang的下一代多态性使陌生的C ++ […]

item.title: 【Guest Blog: Semantic Kernel and Copilot Studio Usage Series – Part 1】嘉宾博客：语义内核和副副研究室用法系列 - 第1部分
item.description: 【Today on the Semantic Kernel blog we’re excited to welcome a group of guest authors from Microsoft. We’ll turn it over to Riccardo Chiodaroli, Samar El Housseini, Daniel Lavve and Fabrizio Ruocco to dive into their use cases with Semantic Kernel and Copilot Studio. In today’s fast-paced digital economy, intelligent automation is no longer optional—it’s […]】今天，在语义内核博客上，我们很高兴欢迎来自Microsoft的一群客座作家。我们将其移交给Riccardo Chiodaroli，Samar El Housseini，Daniel Lavve和Fabrizio Ruocco，以使用语义内核和Copilot Studio潜入他们的用例。在当今快节奏的数字经济中，智能自动化不再是可选的，它是[…]

item.title: 【Enhancing Search Capabilities in SQL Server and Azure SQL with Hybrid Search and RRF Re-Ranking】通过混合搜索和RRF重新排名，在SQL Server和Azure SQL中增强搜索功能
item.description: 【In today’s data-driven world, delivering precise and contextually relevant search results is critical. SQL Server and Azure SQL Database now enable this through Hybrid Search—a technique that combines traditional full-text search with modern vector similarity search. This allows developers to build intelligent, AI-powered search experiences directly inside the database engine. Funny enough one of the […]】在当今数据驱动的世界中，提供精确和上下文相关的搜索结果至关重要。 SQL Server和Azure SQL数据库现在通过混合搜索启用此功能，该技术将传统的全文搜索与现代矢量相似性搜索相结合。这使开发人员可以直接在数据库引擎内部构建智能的AI驱动搜索体验。有趣的[…]之一

item.title: 【On priority inversion in the use of a spinlock to ensure atomic access to a shared_ptr】关于使用Spinlock的优先倒置，以确保原子访问共享_ptr
item.description: 【Priority inversion may be rare, but correctness doesn't care about rarity.】优先倒置可能很少，但是正确性并不关心稀有性。
